attributes.action: prohibit the selling of alcohol by any outlet in the UK on the holy day of Sunday .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to introduce laws making it a criminal offence to sell alcohol in the UK on the day that Lord Jesus Christ King of Heaven and Earth decreed to be sacred . Therefore , public houses such as Billy Bridge`s Bar in Ayr or the Racecourse Hotel , Ayr & all other pubs in the UK would only be allowed to sell soft drinks to the public on this day and thus act in accordance with God`s Holy Will instead of disobeying God on a Sunday .
